But this is unusual, better is Bg5, Bc4 or Be2, as this can be hit by.....

by pinning my knight, he saves his Nd4. This is his only move really!

And we reach an interesting position, where although I am the exchange down, I should eventually win the knight on a8. Although I didn't know it at the time, all this has been seen before.
